author: Andy Greenberg
title: Clever Cryptography Could Save Privacy in Covid-19 Contact-Tracing Apps
description: Researchers are racing to achieve the benefits of location-tracking without the surveillance.
content: Before the Covid-19 pandemic, any system that used smartphones to track locations and contacts sounded like a dystopian surveillance nightmare. Now, it sounds like a dystopian surveillance nightmare that could also save millions of lives and rescue the global… [+6421 chars]
